snippet.title: Aeterna Lucis - Official Teaser & Gameplay Reveal | The Sequel to Aeterna Noctis
snippet.description:
The wait is over! 🎮 Aeterna Lucis, the highly anticipated sequel to Aeterna Noctis, is finally here! Dive into the first official teaser and gameplay reveal, showcasing the evolution of the Metroidvania universe we all love.

Take on the role of the Queen of Light and explore an interconnected world full of challenges, mysteries, and breathtaking hand-drawn art. With refined combat, innovative mechanics, and a deep narrative, Aeterna Lucis is set to become a must-play for Metroidvania fans.

Wishlist Now:
- Steam:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/2710920/Aeterna_Lucis/
- PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/es-es/concept/10009959
